ComicInfo.Title: Doctor Voodoo and the Soul Cage Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
In the aftermath of the tragic battle against Frozen Charlotte, Hulk pays a visit to STRANGE ACADEMY, seeking the help of BROTHER VOODOO in saving Charlie's immortal soul!
But when the task calls for a one-way descent into an exorcist's ancient prison in search of the immortal FLESH-WEAVER, is the price too high even for the Incredible Hulk?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-01 09:09:04. [CVDB1053540]
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie, Doctor Voodoo, Doyle Dormammu, Frozen Charlotte, Guslaug, Hulk, Shaylee Moonpeddle, Zoe Laveau
